QuestData.Title: Hit Medicine
QuestData.Description: Our warriors are fighting to keep the yaungol at bay in the Kun-Lai Pass to the northwest.$B$BTake this liniment. It is a powerful medicine that has been passed down in my family over the generations.$B$BUse the dit da jow to heal the injured warriors if you do not have healing powers of your own to use on them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Dit Da Jow or your own healing to aid 8 Injured Binan Warriors.
QuestData.CompletionText: There are yet more injured warriors in need of aid, $c.
QuestData.RewardText: You have my thanks, $n. You have shown great honor through your actions.$B$BI hope that my family's dit da jow was of some use to you.
